explains: v. 借入；采用（borrow 的 ing 形式）
wordGroup: cost of borrowing 借款费用；借款成本
interbank borrowing 银行同业借贷

sentences.en: Borrowing used to not be recommended.
sentences.cn: 借东西在过去是不提倡的。

sentences.en: High interest rates help to keep borrowing down.
sentences.cn: 高利率有助于控制借贷。

sentences.en: The fund is largely financed through government borrowing.
sentences.cn: 这项基金基本上靠政府借款资助。
